name: 【汉化】The Slaying Of Sandy Hook Elementary
name_original: 【汉化】The Slaying Of Sandy Hook Elementary
description:
为纪念2012年桑迪胡课小学校园枪击案和呼吁美国联邦政府尽快通过限制枪支法案，游戏制作人Ryan Lambourn出版了名为“The Slaying Of Sandy Hook Elementary”的游戏使得玩家在还原凶手作案全过程的同时产生深刻反思。文件中有我制作的汉化版本，但是原版本也在，该FLASH游戏诉诸暴力比较严重。

行动 ← →枪支位移 ↑ ↓互动 A攻击 S武士刀刺下 ↓

To commemorate the Sandy Hook Elementary School shooting in 2012 and to call on the US federal government to pass the gun restriction bill as soon as possible, game producer Ryan Lambourn published a game called "The Slaying Of Sandy Hook Elementary" so that players can restore the whole process of the murderer's crime. At the same time, deep reflection is generated. There is a Chinese version made by me in the file, but the original version is also there. This FLASH game resorts to violence more seriously.
